summary: Every 2 years, we report on federal programs and operations that are vulnerable to waste, fraud, abuse, and mismanagement, or that need broad reform—our High Risk List. Our 2021 report reviews progress and outlines further actions needed in areas on the list. We added 2 new areas on small business emergency loans and drug misuse and removed 1 existing area on Department of Defense support...
title: High-Risk Series: Dedicated Leadership Needed to Address Limited Progress in Most High-Risk Areas
